oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Cattle from New Mexico test site
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Five cows in a corner of a wooden corral.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cattle; Radioactivity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of December 20, 1945 which explains that the cows were about 25 or 30 miles away from the atomic bomb test site.
1366; 1946; Cattle From New Mexico Bomb Test
